title: Feature Comparison: Social Media Management Tools
description: Use these guidelines to research the right social media management tools, collate desired features, and assess the effectiveness of potential
content:
Use these guidelines to research the right social media management tools, collate desired features, and assess the effectiveness of potential candidates.
• Constantly Updated — The download contains the latest and most accurate details.
• Boost Your Processes — Get access to a nine-page PDF explainer and a spreadsheet checklist.
• Find the Best Option — The PDF covers such features as account creation, publishing, community management, and more.
• Expert Guidance — Written by Mark W. Kaelin through 20 hours of research, writing, editing, and design.

This resource is available to download for $19 or for free with an annual TechRepublic Premium subscription — click here to learn more.

keywords.name: the right social media management tools

summary: The guidebook for social media management tools is available for purchase for $19 or for free with an annual TechRepublic Premium subscription. The guide is written by Mark W. Kaelin, who spent 20 hours researching and creating the guidebook. The book also includes a nine-page PDF explainer and a checklist for finding the best options.
